subject: AI & Agents
title: The EU AI Act: Risk-Based Regulation
description: A micro-lesson that makes The EU AI Act: Risk-Based Regulation usable.

hook.text: Europe classified AI systems into risk tiers. High-risk gets mandatory audits.

buildup.text: The EU AI Act bans social scoring and real-time biometric surveillance.

discovery.text: High-risk: healthcare, hiring, law enforcement. Requires testing, documentation, human oversight.

twist.text: General-purpose AI (like GPT) faces transparency and copyright obligations under a new tier.

climax.text: Compliance deadlines are phased. Companies must start preparing now.

punchline.text: First major AI law. Others will follow.

quiz.question: What does the EU AI Act require for high-risk AI systems?
options: Mandatory testing, documentation, and human oversight
